data.title: Larry Miller Recognized for 50 Years of Service
data.meta_description: PeoplesBank is pleased to recognize Mr. Larry J. Miller for 50 years of service to PeoplesBank, the community, and the banking industry. On March 1, 1971, Mr. Miller joined PeoplesBank […]
data.text:
PeoplesBank is pleased to recognize Mr. Larry J. Miller for 50 years of service to PeoplesBank, the community, and the banking industry. On March 1, 1971, Mr. Miller joined PeoplesBank (then known as Peoples Bank of Glen Rock) as a management trainee. Today, Larry serves as the Executive Chairman of PeoplesBank and Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer of Codorus Valley Bancorp, Inc.

“I personally want to thank Larry for providing steady and prudent leadership to PeoplesBank and for dedicating his life’s work to living out our mission and growing our bank’s community impact,” stated Craig L. Kauffman, current President and Chief Executive Officer of PeoplesBank.

Larry Miller’s long tenure in leading the bank from four financial centers to the largest financial institution headquartered in York County over a 50-year period is a rarity. Mr. Miller served as Chief Executive Officer of PeoplesBank for 35 years and as Chief Executive Officer of Codorus Valley Bancorp, Inc. over the last 34 years where he continues to hold that role today. When he joined the bank in 1971, PeoplesBank had $23 million in assets. Through his leadership, the bank has grown today to over $2 billion in assets.

“Larry Miller’s unwavering commitment over the last 50 years to our core value of caring deeply and going further is evident through his dedication to serving our community and developing financial solutions that are accessible to residents living in South Central Pennsylvania and northern Maryland,” commented Kauffman.
